member.name: M:UnityEngine.ScreenCapture.CaptureScreenshot(System.String)
member.summary: Captures a screenshot at path filename as a PNG file.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.ScreenCapture.CaptureScreenshot(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Captures a screenshot at path filename as a PNG file.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.ScreenCapture.CaptureScreenshotAsTexture(System.Int32)
member.summary: Captures a screenshot of the game view into a Texture2D object.
